overview: His name is Born, Frank Born, and he suffers from an illness known as Bonditis!! In this very funny parody, Frank believes he is James Bond. His entire reality is shaped around this fantasy as he believes he has to save the world!
tagline: Hilarious FUNâ€¦with the young man who thought he was - JAMES BOND
title: Bonditis, or the Horrible and Terrible Adventures of a Nearly Normal Human Being
